price: 170. Et ceux qui s’en tiennent au Livre et qui observent la Çalât, (qu’ils sachent que) Nous ne laisserons point se perdre la récompense des gens de bien.
arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ يُمَسِّكُونَ بِٱلۡكِتَٰبِ وَأَقَامُواْ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ إِنَّا لَا نُضِيعُ أَجۡرَ ٱلۡمُصۡلِحِينَ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: wa-alladhīna yumassikūna bil-kitābi wa-aqāmū al-ṣalata innā lā nuḍīʿu ajra al-muṣ'liḥīna
